meanings.definition: Not relating to or involving chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the nonchromosomal traits of the organism.
meanings.sent2: The nonchromosomal characteristics of the plant were unique.
meanings.sent3: The nonchromosomal puzzle piece didn't fit in with the others.
meanings.sent4: Her nonchromosomal approach to problem-solving was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The nonchromosomal patterns in the sky fascinated the children.

meanings.definition: Not occurring or located on a chromosome.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the nonchromosomal mutation to the patient.
meanings.sent2: The nonchromosomal gene was responsible for the rare condition.
meanings.sent3: The nonchromosomal sock somehow ended up in the wrong drawer.
meanings.sent4: His nonchromosomal talent for music was evident from a young age.
meanings.sent5: The nonchromosomal glow of the fireflies lit up the night.
